kv3.6:7.1: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi mano, atthi manindriyanti?
kv3.6:7.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:7.6: aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi mano, atthi manindriyanti?
kv3.6:7.8: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, atthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:8.1: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi somanassaṃ, atthi somanassindriyaṃ, atthi jīvitaṃ, atthi jīvitindriyanti?
kv3.6:8.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:8.6: aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi jīvitaṃ, atthi jīvitindriyanti?
kv3.6:9.1: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:9.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi mano, natthi manindriyanti?
kv3.6:10.1: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:10.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi somanassaṃ, natthi somanassindriyanti … pe …
kv3.6:10.8: aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, natthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:10.10: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi mano, natthi manindriyanti?
kv3.6:12.1: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, sā ca saddhā niyyānikāti?
kv3.6:12.3: Hañci aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, sā ca saddhā niyyānikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv3.6:12.5: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi vīriyaṃ, tañca vīriyaṃ niyyānikaṃ;
kv3.6:12.6: atthi sati, sā ca sati niyyānikā;
kv3.6:12.7: atthi samādhi, so ca samādhi niyyāniko;
kv3.6:12.8: atthi paññā, sā ca paññā niyyānikāti?
kv3.6:12.10: Hañci aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, sā ca paññā niyyānikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv3.6:13.1: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:13.3: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:13.6: sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi paññā, atthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:13.8: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, atthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:14.2: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, atthi saddhindriyaṃ … pe …
kv3.6:14.6: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, atthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:15.1: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:15.3: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti?
kv3.6:15.6: aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi paññā, natthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:15.8: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi paññā, natthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:16.1: Aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi saddhā, natthi saddhindriyanti … pe …
kv3.6:16.6: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa atthi paññā, natthi paññindriyanti?
kv3.6:17.8: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ samattā paripūrattā arahā hoti.
kv3.6:17.9: Tato mudutarehi arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi anāgāmī hoti, tato mudutarehi anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sakadāgāmī hoti, tato mudutarehi sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sotāpanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hoti.
kv3.6:17.10: Yassa kho, bhikkhave, imāni pañcindriyāni sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ natthi, tamahaṃ ‘bāhiro puthujjanapakkhe ṭhito’ti vadāmī”ti.
kv3.6:17.16: tena hi aṭṭhamakassa puggalassa atthi pañcindriyānīti.
